description: Be rescue ready for glacier travel. This kit comes with everything (minus the rope) that you'd need for crevasse rescues or rope ascents.Micro Traxion Pulley is used for self rescue, or for rope capture while hauling a fallen climber.Partner Pulley has side plates that open for quick attachment to a rope. Nylon sheaves with aluminum side plates provide a good strength to weight ratio.Tibloc functions in place of prussiks or rope clamps.  Angled teeth and self-cleaning slot ensure good grip on icy ropes.Screwlock carabiners are symmetrical so they stay centred on the pulleys.120cm Dyneema sling works as an aider in self rescue, or as a redirect for hauling.
name: Petzl Crevasse Rescue Kit
